channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Silent On Tesla Attacks, Shapiro Calls For ‘Moral Clarity’ On Arson At His Mansion
item.description: The truth is, the left loves violence. It causes fear and anger. These are tools of intimidation for shaping public opinion and behavior.

item.title: I hate shopping. ChatGPT is already helping me in ways Google never did
item.description: ChatGPT can act as a personal stylist and shopping assistant, something far beyond what a Google search offers.

item.title: Duolingo’s CEO has one golden rule and 5 essential traits when it comes to hiring
item.description: One of Luis von Ahn approved hiring traits includes bringing the vibes to the office—that's music to Gen Z’s ears.

item.title: 'Biden effect' hits the Senate: Wave of retirements clears path for younger Dems
item.description: After Sen. Dick Durbin announced his retirement, the idea of the "Biden effect" came back into focus.

item.title: Forcing Ukraine to Surrender to Russia Is No Path to Sustainable Peace
item.description: A world in which the U.S. won’t stand up for the very basic principle that countries should not invade their neighbors is a more dangerous place.

item.title: With Wisconsin Case, It’s Time For SCOTUS To Finally Define ‘Religion’
item.description: Without a definition of religion, courts are forced to guess at what activities mandate protection from government interference.

item.title: Social Media Is Killing the Democratic Party

item.title: Nearly half of Gen Z and Millennials say college was a waste of money—AI has already made degrees obsolete
item.description: College graduates are calling their degrees worthless, thanks to student loans, a fuzzy job market, and AI.
